summary: AN ORDINANCE making an appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement Fund for necessary preliminary expenses of the Engineering Department in connection with the proposed improvement of the Alley in Montbeacon Addition; the alley in Block 85, Central Seattle Addition (commonly known as McNaught's Central Seattle Addition); the alley in Block 11, Walker's Addition; and the alley between Lots 21 and 22, McNaught's Supplemental Plat of Central Seattle; the alley in Block 39, Charles B. Lee's Replat of Blocks 39 and 40 of Hanford's Addition to South Seattle; the alley in Block 32, Seattle Homestead Addition; and the alley in Block 73, Riley's Addition to South Seattle, as contemplated by the advisory petitions contained in Comptroller's Files 285230, 285231, 285229, 285228, 285233, 285232, and 285384, respectively, providing for partial reimbursement if a local improvement district is formed.
